QuestData.Title: A Cold Front Approaches
QuestData.Description: The chill of death stirs in the west, threatening to freeze our hearts and souls to this wasteland and bind us to its dark master. We will stand and we will fight!$B$BThe preparations have begun. Report to Siegemaster Fezzik at the front gate for your assignment.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Siegemaster Fezzik at the Argent Vanguard in Icecrown.
QuestData.RewardText: We must be quick or face being overtaken by the Scourge! There's really no time for instructions, $r. You're just going to have to jump in and hope for the best.
